data: The person Sarah Thompson works as a General Partner at GreenSeed Ventures in the venture capital industry.
The person Sarah Thompson has 12 years of experience in venture capital focusing on sustainable and climate tech investments.
The person Sarah Thompson is located in New York, New York, United States.
The person Sarah Thompson has expertise in deal sourcing, portfolio management, and fundraising.
The person Sarah Thompson has led investments in 15 companies with 3 exits achieving 5x returns.
The person Sarah Thompson has researched portfolio companies and is interested in climate tech based on notes from PitchBook and Crunchbase.
